i have do that with only 1 texture 256x256 but if you cubemap it the result can be really awesome

Luca

Edited March 2, 2016 by Badsector
Imho asteroids in KSP are just a primitive with displacement map, thus just some randomized map generator might be needed...

Other thing about asteroids is when empty they works as drogue chute and you can use it for land safely your ship without any chute.

Asteroids definition have a density of 0.03 (30 kg for m³?) versus stock parts density of 0.125 (125 kg for m³)
